author: sky.cactus
content: Strongly recommend using deterministic deployment proxy to deploy so address is same on every blockchain!

author: sky.cactus
content:
https://github.com/Zoltu/deterministic-deployment-proxy
You just need to change the `to` field of a regular deployment transaction to `0x7A0D94F55792C434d74a40883C6ed8545E406D12`, otherwise it is a normal deployment transaction.

author: _shemnon
content: Still need the deployment proxy to come in as an unprotected legacy transaction.  The same technique used to get that deployment proxy live is what can be used to deploy the contract, with less steps.

author: _shemnon
content: While testnets have it other chains such as L2s and their testnets may not, and getting it on there is the same as just using a synthetic create1 for the contract itself.
